ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: to which anyone who wills may pay heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Let him then who heeds remember it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So, whoever wills may benefit from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Let anyone who seeks guidance do so.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So whoever wills may heed advice from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, whosoever wills receives admonition from it!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So whoever pleases may mind it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: so whoever wills shall remember it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Let him who will take heed:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So whosoever willeth may heed it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So let anyone who wishes be mindful of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Let any who will, keep it in remembrance!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So whosoever will (let him read it), and receive admonition (from it)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So, whoever wills, will remember it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So whoever wills, shall remember it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then whoever wills will remember it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:55] So whoever wills shall remember it, he shall read it and be admonished by it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So whosoever will may heed) may take admonition.
